description: 3 rounds, how many out of the 15 shots can you pocket? Without fouls and without caroms. Use balls 1-5 for the first round, 6-10 for the second round and 11-15 for the third.
3 rounds, how many out of the 15 shots can you pocket? Without fouls and without caroms. Use balls 1-5 for the first round, 6-10 for the second round and 11-15 for the third.
3 rounds, how many out of the 15 shots can you pocket? Without fouls and without caroms. Use balls 1-5 for the first round, 6-10 for the second round and 11-15 for the third.

3 rounds of 5 stroke-shots (follow & draw). How many out of 15 can you score?
 Shot 1: Follow into same pocket
 Shot 2: Follow into the center zone
Shot 3: Draw Cueball into opposite pocket
 Shot 4: Ball-in-hand follow into centerzone
Shot 5: Ball-in-hand draw back into center zone
